parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup set.

parameters.name: BackupStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the backup set. Valid values:

*   **Success**
*   **Failed**

parameters.name: BackupType
parameters.description:
The backup type. Valid values:

*   **FullBackup**: full backup
*   **IncrementalBackup**: incremental backup

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

> We recommend that you specify a time range that is as short as possible to avoid timeout.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Valid values: any non-zero positive integer.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
